channel.title: Project PK-Heaven - Development team required
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b][u]Project PK-Heaven[/u][/b][/center]
[size=14pt][b][u]About Project PK-Heaven[/u][/b][/size] Project PK-Heaven is a long term goal that I aim to accomplish. The Aim of this project is too start a RuneScape Private server from a virtually blank source and to compete as one of the top servers!
[size=14pt][b][u]What I'm looking for[/u][/b][/size] I'm looking to assemble a dedicated development team that are also interested in this project. I'm looking first and foremost for a couple of people with extensive knowledge of coding RSPS's to aid my limited knowledge and help code the client/server. Secondly, I would like a GFX designer, someone who is very very good at making graphics to design the webpage/forums and any other graphics required.
[size=14pt][b][u]How would this benefit you?[/u][/b][/size] Coders and GFX designers [b]WILL receive a cut of donations when the server is up and running.
[size=14pt][b][u]How to apply![/size] [code]Which role are you interested in?: What is your age?: What country do you live in?: Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me: Do you have anyone to back up what you're saying?: MSN username:[/code] Please leave your application below.

item.title: Project PK-Heaven - Development team required
item.dc:creator: @floydy floydy
item.description:
@floydy wrote:

asshole_rule:

That’s better. You should probably edit your original post, and good luck.

Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Project PK-Heaven - Development team required
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

floydy:

Sorry, From scratch I mean a blank source meaning we would only need to change npc locations etc.

That’s better. You should probably edit your original post, and good luck.

item.title: Project PK-Heaven - Development team required
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

From scratch? You’re going to write EVERYTHING? I know that you’re lying but anyways, if someone actually was going to do this they wouldn’t need a gfx designer for a while, it would take months.

Read full topic

item.title: Project PK-Heaven - Development team required
item.dc:creator: @floydy floydy
item.description:
@floydy wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Project PK-Heaven[/center]

[size=14pt]About Project PK-Heaven[/size]
Project PK-Heaven is a long term goal that I aim to accomplish. The Aim of this project is too start a RuneScape Private server from a virtually blank source and to compete as one of the top servers!

[size=14pt]What I’m looking for[/size]
I’m looking to assemble a dedicated development team that are also interested in this project. I’m looking first and foremost for a couple of people with extensive knowledge of coding RSPS’s to aid my limited knowledge and help code the client/server. Secondly, I would like a GFX designer, someone who is very very good at making graphics to design the webpage/forums and any other graphics required.

[size=14pt]How would this benefit you?[/size]
Coders and GFX designers [b]WILL receive a cut of donations when the server is up and running.

[size=14pt][b][u]How to apply![/size]

Which role are you interested in?: What is your age?: What country do you live in?: Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me: Do you have anyone to back up what you're saying?: MSN username:
Please leave your application below.

Read full topic
